Banner.Title: Omar Hassan.
Banner.Description: I have +3 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Nodejs, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In +3 years of experience I have covered many roles: Systems Analyst, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and Technical Lead. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Frontend development and UI/UX design for scalable enterprise projects with Angular and Laravel Blade, ensuring responsive and high-performance user interfaces.
Building and maintaining modular, component-driven architectures to support complex systems like ERP, HR, and Monitoring Dashboards.
Integration of RESTful APIs, real-time updates, and dynamic data visualization using Angular Material, RxJS, and Chart.js.
Implementation of clean code practices, version control (Git), and automated CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and deployment.
Collaboration with backend teams to ensure seamless frontend–backend communication and data flow.
Active contribution to Linrco Egypt’s internal tools and client-facing platforms, focusing on scalability, maintainability, and modern design principles.
Conducting regular planning, sprint reviews, and performance optimization sessions to enhance application stability and user experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Frontend development for financial and installment service platforms, acting as a system intermediary between installment companies to streamline and automate business operations.
Building and maintaining scalable and responsive web interfaces using Next.js and Laravel Blade templates, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
Collaborating with backend teams to integrate complex APIs and financial workflows into the frontend layer.
Implementing reusable UI components and design systems with modern frameworks and styling tools including SASS, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS.
Enhancing user experience and efficiency through process automation, clean architecture, and data-driven design.
Contributing to continuous improvement cycles, code reviews, and system scalability enhancements to support growing financial operations.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Frontend development of multiple e-learning and e-commerce platforms for international clients within a software house environment.
Building scalable, modular, and high-performance interfaces using React.js, React Router, Context API, and modern state management patterns.
Collaborating closely with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs and ensure seamless data communication across platforms.
Developing responsive and visually appealing UI components with Material-UI, Tailwind CSS, and SASS to enhance user experience.
Optimizing performance, implementing reusable design systems, and ensuring best practices in accessibility and code quality.
Managing project timelines, reviewing code, and contributing to system scalability and maintainability for global client projects.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Instructor – MERN Stack
Description: Delivered practical training sessions on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) to students, focusing on real-world project development.
Explained core frontend and backend concepts, API integration, and database management in a simplified and effective way.
Guided students through fullstack project implementation and best practices in clean coding and performance optimization.
Provided mentorship and technical support throughout the course duration, ensuring deep understanding and hands-on experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Development Trainee – Web & User Interface Development Track, Ismailia, Egypt
Description: Completed an intensive fullstack development program covering both frontend and backend technologies with a strong software engineering foundation.
Studied and applied data structures, algorithms, and software design principles for scalable web applications.
Worked with multiple frontend frameworks such as Angular, React, Next.js, and Vue.js.
Developed backend applications using Node.js and NestJS, with hands-on experience in SQL, MySQL, and MongoDB databases.
Built fullstack web projects from scratch, applying responsive design, clean architecture, and modern UI/UX standards.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Personal Portfolio
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A sleek, responsive portfolio website designed to showcase my projects, skills, and contact information in a visually appealing manner.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Air Tickets Reservation App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An intuitive application that simplifies the process of searching for air tickets, featuring a user-friendly interface and real-time availability.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Full Angular E-Commerce
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive e-commerce application built with Angular, featuring product management, user authentication, and a seamless shopping experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: X-Abayat E-Commerce with 2 Sides Auth for Client and Designer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive e-commerce application built with React, featuring product management, user authentication, Client and Designers with social media side for designer with dashboard, and a seamless shopping experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sigmaty Dashboard
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive data visualization dashboard that aggregates and displays key metrics and insights, enabling users to make informed decisions with an intuitive interface.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-Commerce Store, Auction, LiveChat
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A dynamic e-commerce platform that includes product listings, a shopping cart, user authentication, auction capabilities, and a live chat feature for real-time bidding and communication.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
